item.title: PECHACKS_MLH
item.description: How we almost made an centralised blockchain based universal currency during PECHACKS 2024 We enter the hackathon So my friend Noumaan approaches me and tells there is this hackathon in Panimalar college and wanted to go and had a spot left.

item.title: Raven
item.description: Home media server I was bored and wanted to created my own personal netflix at home. So, naturally i wanted some kind of hardware that can run a media server Fortunately, I had a spare laptop lying around a toshiba .
